Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-16

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.11 (existing codebase) (001-openai-chat-integration)
- Stateless (no persistent storage required for initial implementation) (001-openai-chat-integration)

- Python 3.11+ + slack-bolt-python (official Slack framework), uv (package manager) (001-slack-mention-bot)

tests/
